item.title: 307: DM Designing (feat. Wild Mage Press)
item.description:
DMs Neal and Derrick sit down with Hannah Rose and Clara Daly from Wild Mage Press to discuss ways to breakdown designing things for the table! Wild Mage Press Patreon @DMs_Block Discord Facebook Stitcher iTunes dungeonmasterblock@gmail.com Knocked Prone Badventure Club Episode edited by: Neal Powell
Feed: https://feed.podbean.com/dungeonmasterblock/feed.xml
